remarks: A change of bound variable, often used in proofs for ~ etransc . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem6 $p |- ( x e. RR |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) = ( y e. RR |-> ( ( y ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ k e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( y - k ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
$d M j k x y $.
$d P j k x y $.
